atk-vin02a43:2_1: Sanidānaṁ saniddesanti nidānena ca niddesena ca saddhiṁ pucchissāmi.
atk-vin02a43:2_2: Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ kati āpattiyoti yāni tattha samukkaṭṭhāni uttamāni padāni vuttāni,
atk-vin02a43:2_3: tesaṁ samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ uttamapadānaṁ saṅkhepato kati āpattiyo hontīti.
atk-vin02a43:2_4: Yena yena hi padena yā yā āpatti paññattā,
atk-vin02a43:2_5: sā sā tassa tassa padassa āpattīti vuccati.
atk-vin02a43:2_7: Dve āpattiyoti ūnavīsativassaṁ upasampādentassa pācittiyaṁ, sesesu sabbapadesu dukkaṭaṁ.
atk-vin02a43:3_1: ko tehi attho’’ti bhedapurekkhārānaṁ uposathakaraṇe thullaccayaṁ,
atk-vin02a43:3_3: sesesu dukkaṭanti evaṁ uposathakkhandhake tisso āpattiyo.
atk-vin02a43:4_2: sesesu dukkaṭanti evaṁ pavāraṇākkhandhakepi tisso āpattiyo.
atk-vin02a43:5_2: sesesu dukkaṭanti evaṁ cammasaṁyuttepi tisso āpattiyo.
atk-vin02a43:5_3: Bhesajjakkhandhakepi samantā dvaṅgule thullaccayaṁ, bhojjayāguyā pācittiyaṁ,
atk-vin02a43:6_0: Kathinaṁ kevalaṁ paññattimeva, natthi tattha āpatti.
atk-vin02a43:8_2: Khuddakavatthuke attano aṅgajātaṁ chindati, thullaccayaṁ, romaṭṭhe pācittiyaṁ,
atk-vin02a43:9_2: Samācāraṁ pucchissanti vutte vattakkhandhake ekā dukkaṭāpattiyeva.
atk-vin02a43:9_3: Sā sabbavattesu anādariyena hoti. Tathā pātimokkhaṭṭhapane.
atk-vin02a43:9_6: Pañcasatikasattasatikesu kevalaṁ dhammo saṅgahaṁ āropito, natthi tattha āpattīti.
